fields.description: Worried that your English writing isn’t good enough for university? This course is designed to help you learn the basics of university-level academic writing. Through video, discussions, peer and self evaluation, you’ll build a solid foundation for your future writing and finish the course with completed essay on a topic of your choosing.
fields.title: Beginner's Guide to Academic Writing
fields.caption: Learn how to use English for study at university or college and develop your writing skills, vocabulary and grammar.

fields.title: Introduction to Public Speaking
fields.caption: Learn the principles of public speaking by critically examining your own and othersâ€™ speeches through interactive practice.

fields.title: Resume Writing and Interview Skills
fields.caption: Learn how to effectively develop employment application materials for today's job market by honing your resume writing skills, developing an effective cover letter, and showcasing your personality, strengths, interests, and abilities to potential employers.

fields.title: Intro to HTML & CSS
fields.caption: Learn how to convert digital design mockups into static web pages by perfecting page layout, breaking down a design mockup into page elements, and implementing that in HTML and CSS.

fields.title: NCLEX-Registered Nurses Test Prep
fields.caption: Prepare for the National Council Licensing Examination for Registered Nurses (NCLEX-RN) with content developed specifically for nursing students getting ready for the test.

fields.title: Start Writing Fiction
fields.caption: Learn how to get started with your own fiction writing, focusing first on the central skill of creating characters.
